item.title: Finance
item.description: AI Use Cases in Financial Services 1. Identity Document Validation and Data Extraction 2. Customer support chatbot using LLMs 3. Product recommender for banking products and services 4. Early warning and churn detection 5. Behavioural customer segmentation 1. Identity Document Validation and Data Extraction Streamline your customer verification process by using AI to classify, validate and extract data from identity documents such as passports, driver’s licenses, and national ID cards in most countries.

item.title: Malawian ID and Selfie Verification Service
Melio AI: Cloud Service Agreement
item.description: Melio AI, Inc. Cloud Service Agreement This Agreement has 3 parts: (1) the Order Form and (2) the Key Terms, and (3) the Common Paper Cloud Service Standard Terms Version 2.0 posted at commonpaper.com/standards/cloud-service-agreement/2.0 (“Standard Terms”). If there is any inconsistency between the parts of the Agreement, the part listed earlier will control over the part listed later for that inconsistency. Capitalized and highlighted words have the meanings given on this Page.
